content.description: slab climbing with a fun arÃªte and a cruxy last move to the anchors
content.protection: Two bolt anchor (lead bolts comming soon)
content.location: The route follows a aret/ slab just to the left of a thick moss coverd wall shares anchors with Pinching Peanuts

content.description: this is a great intro slab climb with lots of friction
content.protection: 4 bolts and a .75 camolot (optional) for the top. Two bolt anchor
content.location: this is the farthest left route on the turd just right of a roof and crack system.

content.description: This is the route that gose up a blank looking slab with tinny crystals for you to squeeze and slab on. The crux is found when the crystals are not...
content.protection: Top rope for now (2 bolts) lead bolts to be added soon
content.location: east face of the turd right of slabtacular

content.description: Slab at the parking area for the CLAM, This has some good slab routes for those who are looking at getting into leading to those who need practice on their footwork (you might have no options for hands)their are some short cracks on the back side of this formation and some very nice boulders in the area as well.
